column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Visiting Chicago for the first time
column2: I would be crazy if I didn't try the famous deep dish pizza. Three of us ordered a large house salad to share (a comically large portion size) and a deep dish sausage special. The salad wasn't anything special
column3: although there was enough to feed about 15 people
column4: but the pizza was everything I thought it would be. Very greasy
column6: and impossible to eat with your hands. My only complaint is that the pizza becomes less appetizing once it cools down
column7: so hurry up and eat it as quickly as you can!
